markdownRemark.html:
ðŸ’¼ Business Ideas

Kick Starters:

  • Deluxe floss tool - that is meant to last forever

    • Sleek design
    • Floss cutter
    • Floss measurement - only use the necessary amount of floss
    • Super strong metal construction
    • Floss dispenser built in

  • Deluxe sunglasses - that is meant to be repaired

    • Super strong metal construction
    • Ability to easily replace lens
    • Ability to easily replace legs
    • Uses common size of lens - allowing users to cannibalize cheap glasses for the lens
    • Everything part can be repaired, replaced, or fixed
    • Comes with
    • replacement screws - use common size
    • screw driver
    • another pair of lens

    • repair guide

      Apps:

  • Uber (ride hailing) for rickshaws - Quirky

    • User can request a ride in a rickshaw

    • Rides can be requested only when near a driver

      Subscriptions

  • Paper clip of the month

    • a unique paper clip is sent to the user every month
    • Each paper clip is unique and painted / finished to be different every month
    • Each paper clip is attached to a small poem
    • Cost is very low, mostly to cover the cost of shipping.

  • Art of the month

    • a small work of art is shipped to the user each month
    • There is a limited number of users that can sign up each month

    • Partner with local artist to fufill orders

      Quirky / Rouge

  • Emergency thimble dispenser

    • small coin op device that dispenses a thimble
    • excepts any size of coin
    • deploy on beltline
